detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value: This course is the former ECON334. Students with credit for ECON334 are not eligible to register.

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
This course is the former ECON334. Students with credit for ECON334 are not eligible to register.

Section 002 of ECON 333 will follow a hybrid format. Lectures will be live-streamed synchronously with section 001, on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 9:30 AM to 11:00 AM. Midterm and final exams will be held in person on dates and times to be announced. In-person exam attendance is mandatory. There will be no online exam options.

In-person lecture attendance may be possible on request, subject to seating space availability in section 001. Permission from the instructor will be required.

uiLabels.WDRES.FACETEDSEARCH.SymanSyntax:
Boolean logic can be expressed using AND, OR, NOT, and (). 
Exact phrases can be surrounded by double quotation marks. 
Example: ("software engineer" OR computer science) AND ~manager~.
